title: Blended Instructional Design Practice Reflecting Cultural Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: VR device rentals and provision of mobile-optimized content.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructional design models that account for diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can create culturally adaptive educational scenarios using mobile-based simulation tools.

Learners can develop 1 set of industry-applicable instructional materials (1 theme, 3 activities, assessment rubric) for corporate training contexts (e.g., new employee multicultural education) through 4-week project-based assessment and receive â‰¥4/5 average field applicability ratings from 2 HR professionals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
